title: Error 004 ,unable to patch game.
body:
So yesterday i had no problems , this morning woke up went to play few games , guess what! i cant update client.
It starts scanning and after few seconds i get error 004. I tryed literally everything that riot recommended . I even deleted my antivirus and tryed multiple time to repair client and all it ended was "Repair failed" . I can't afford to reinstall completly game as my internet is less than 100 KB'ps and it crashes very often. Is there anything else left to do?

replies.body: There are others with this same problem. I had to reinstall completely.

It sounds like something else could be blocking your game files from being scanned or repairing, though it could be a network block as well.  Deleting your antivirus might be an unsafe method, so instead I suggest going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS is allowing League as an exception.  Let me know if that helps.
I did that like at start , anyway somehow i just let the client open , it kept opening that error but still installed , it just fixed itself magicly.
